decision_conditions:

description: Partial discharge of conditions 7 a, d, h, i j, l (building A), disharge of condition 7 b (all buildings) and partial discharge of condition 8 pursuant to planning application reference 17/0076/FUMOPDC dated 14/11/2017 for 'residential-led, mixed use redevelopment of the site to provide three new courtyard blocks, ranging from 5 storeys to 27 storeys in height comprising 807 residential units (Use Class C3), 1361sqm (GIA) of flexible retail/employment/community floor space (Use Classes A1, A2, B1 and D1)  with publicly accessible open space, private and shared amenity space; hard and soft landscaping; alterations to existing, and creation of new, vehicular accesses and pedestrian routes; substation; servicing bay on Lakeside Drive, car and cycle parking and associated works'
